title: My Teen Years Were Marked By Abuse
description:
Bob says he was a confused teenager from a broken home when he was sexually abused by an older man, and he wonders if therapy might help him overcome his anger. - Dr. Laura: "Some victims incorrectly believe they allowed the abuse to happen."

Has therapy ever helped you achieve your goals? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
